actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal its minimum wage requirement.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act to repeal its minimum wage requirement. Provides that any reference to such requirement in any other Federal law shall be of no force and effect on or after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal its minimum wage requirement.
